snippet: Errol Morris revisits the case of Jeffrey MacDonald (of “Fatal Vision” fame), and posits that Mr. MacDonald did not get a fair trial.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book A Wilderness of Error: The Trials of Jeffrey MacDonald by Errol Morris.
lead_paragraph: Errol Morris revisits the case of Jeffrey MacDonald (of “Fatal Vision” fame), and posits that Mr. MacDonald did not get a fair trial.

headline.seo: ‘A Wilderness of Error,’ by Errol Morris, on the MacDonald Trial
headline.main: A New Angle on a 1970 Murder Case
headline.print_headline: A New Angle On a 1970 Murder Case
